The update brings you a CO-OP game mode! Also, get ready for exciting new towers, a brand-new world, new synergies, and other game improvements.

New Content:
- Co-op Game Mode! Team up with other players and defeat endless waves of enemies together.
- World 8. Get access to a new world from Outerspace. Can you defeat the magician and his mean little friends on Mars?
- Brand New Towers. Command the legendary Firethrower, Fire Boomerang, and Bowling Bomb in Auto Defense!
- New Synergy for More Strategy. "Burn" is now available in-game.

Optimizations:
- Scalable Content for Chests. The more worlds you complete, the more cards you get from chests!
- Bugs Fixed.

Get ready for Daily Events and three powerful new towers in Update 7!

New Content:
- Daily Events: Never a dull moment in Auto Defense! Participate in exciting events daily to win grand rewards.
- Money Maker Turret: Jackpot! Repel the nasty chomps by throwing coins at them. That must hurt!
- Giant Killer Tower: Bull's-eye! Always hit your target with this powerful new turret. It can take down even the largest chomp!
- Turbo Laser Turret: Slice the enemies in just a few seconds with the new Turbo Laser Turret!
- Bug fixes and optimizations for a smooth gaming experience.

Update 8 brings you a daily login bonus, daily quests, an exciting player-level system, a bunch of new turrets, and more!

New Content:
- Daily Login Bonus: Enter Auto Defense daily to receive in-game perks! Stay on the lookout, as some days have truly extraordinary rewards. Better yet, your progress in the daily login calendar is saved even if you skip days.
- Daily Quests: Complete specific tasks every day to get rewards! Are you dissatisfied with the quests you have for today? Watch an ad to refresh the list and get new quests!
- Player-Level System: Gain experience points to increase your player level and your castle's health! Upgrading turrets and completing daily quests grant you EXP points. Each level-up increases your castle's health points by 20 HP! The maximum player level is currently 20. Veteran players get their level automatically increased based on their turret upgrades when they launch UPD8.
- 3 New Turrets: Add the Fire Ball Shield, the brand-new Crossbow, and the Robin Hood turrets to your roster! Throw spheres of fire and launch arrows at your enemies in UPD8!
- 2 New Enemies & 1 New Boss: There are two new green enemies and one new boss waiting for a challenge in a limited-time event. Can you defeat them all?

General Bug Fixes:
As always, we also squashed some bugs and optimized the gameplay experience for you. Enjoy the new update!

Let the developers know your feedback about UPD8 on Discord! https://discord.gg/ZVy2TAb

Hello, defenders!

A new hotfix is available on the App Store, so go ahead and download it.
We reduced the frequency of the advertisements, to improve your experience whne playing the game.
This hotfix also addresses some issues that you encountered, including random crashes during gameplay and makes other minor fixes and improvements.

IMPORTANT NOTES:
This app requires an iPad (6th generation) or newer, or an iPhone 7 (or newer). A network connection is required to play.
This app supports devices running on iOS 11 and above. Please make sure to update your OS to the next version, if available.

Download the Auto Defense update to get a new world, rebalanced worlds and events, translation fixes, design improvements, and the usual bug fixes and optimizations!

1. Venture into the dangerous jungle and challenge wild creatures in the newly released WORLD 9.
2. Recalibrate your strategy for the first two Worlds and the Daily Events, as their difficulty levels are now REBALANCED!
3. Enjoy navigating the menus in one language only due to the TRANSLATION FIXES added to the update.
4. Marvel in the DESIGN IMPROVEMENTS made for the world and event completion screen and the Special Offers menu.

Do you have any thoughts on the update? Share them with us on the Discord server or the Facebook Group!
